name: Atium
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.gstatic.com/ https://*.firebaseio.com https://www.googleapis.com https://api.hubapi.com; object-src 'self' https://api.hubapi.com; https://www.*.google.com/* connect-src 'self' https://www.*.google.com/* wss://*.firebaseio.com https://api.hubapi.com;
